message: I'd like to provide a visual indication in the UI that the group is private
please tell me you're making that available to paying customers :-)
okay, done. you should now see a "kind" param that is either "public" or "private"
there are also "stealth" groups ... but VERY few of them
the difference between private and stealth is that stealth don't show up in search results and you can't view them at all unless you're a member
I think we'll make those targeted towards businesses

but if that is a paid feature, the usage of this would not be anywhere targeting casual users, and they may forge to use facebook groups since it provides roughly the same thing (take a post as a topic, comments as replies, and they do sync immediately across all online users) and facebook is not going to charge anyone one on that...
@itsnotvalid we won't charge for what exists in convore already
however, we might add features targeted exclusively towards businesses
